date: "2024-05-28"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(knockoff)
library(pracma)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Setting 1 cutoff comparison


```{r}
combined_df_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2 <- ep_method1_cutoff_.1_setting1_v2 %>% 
  full_join(ep_method1_cutoff_.2_setting1_v2 %>% rename(power_cutoff_.2 = power, fdr_cutoff_.2 = fdr), by = 'a') %>% 
  full_join(ep_method1_cutoff_.3_setting1_v2 %>% rename(power_cutoff_.3 = power, fdr_cutoff_.3 = fdr), by = 'a') %>% 
  full_join(ep_method1_cutoff_.4_setting1_v2 %>% rename(power_cutoff_.4 = power, fdr_cutoff_.4 = fdr), by = 'a') %>% 
  full_join(ep_method1_cutoff_.5_setting1_v2 %>% rename(power_cutoff_.5 = power, fdr_cutoff_.5 = fdr), by = 'a') %>% 
  full_join(ep_method1_cutoff_.6_setting1_v2 %>% rename(power_cutoff_.6 = power, fdr_cutoff_.6 = fdr), by = 'a') %>% 
  full_join(ep_method1_cutoff_.7_setting1_v2 %>% rename(power_cutoff_.7 = power, fdr_cutoff_.7 = fdr), by = 'a') %>% 
  full_join(ep_method1_cutoff_.8_setting1_v2 %>% rename(power_cutoff_.8 = power, fdr_cutoff_.8 = fdr), by = 'a') %>% 
  full_join(ep_method1_cutoff_.9_setting1_v2 %>% rename(power_cutoff_.9 = power, fdr_cutoff_.9 = fdr), by = 'a') %>% 
  full_join(ep_method1_cutoff_1_setting1_v2 %>% rename(power_cutoff_1 = power, fdr_cutoff_1 = fdr), by = 'a')

combined_df_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2 <- combined_df_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2 %>% 
  rename(power_cutoff_.1 = power, fdr_cutoff_.1 = fdr)
```



```{r}
long_df_power_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2 <- pivot_longer(combined_df_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2, 
                                                          cols = starts_with("power_cutoff_"), 
                                       names_to = "Cutoff", 
                                       values_to = "Power")
```

```{r}
long_df_fdr_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2 <- pivot_longer(combined_df_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2, 
                                                        cols = c("fdr_cutoff_.1", 
                                                             "fdr_cutoff_.2",
                                                             'fdr_cutoff_.3',
                                                             'fdr_cutoff_.4',
                                                             'fdr_cutoff_.5',
                                                             'fdr_cutoff_.6',
                                                             'fdr_cutoff_.7',
                                                             'fdr_cutoff_.8',
                                                             'fdr_cutoff_.9',
                                                             'fdr_cutoff_1'
                                                             ), 
                                       names_to = "Cutoff", 
                                       values_to = "FDR")
```



```{r}
library(RColorBrewer)
custom_palette_function <- colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(9, "YlOrRd"))
color_palette <- custom_palette_function(10)
#color_palette <- c("#FFF7BC", color_palette)
power_plot_summary_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2 <- ggplot(long_df_power_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2, aes(x = a, y = Power, color = Cutoff)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = color_palette) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 1)) + 
  labs(title = "Simulated Power Across Different Methods - Setting 1 (n = 200, d = 40, k = 8)", x = "Signal Strength - Amplitude", y = "Simulated Power") 
print(power_plot_summary_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2)
```

```{r}
fdr_plot_summary_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2 <- ggplot(long_df_fdr_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2, aes(x = a, y = FDR, color = Cutoff)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = color_palette) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, .15)) + 
  labs(title = "Simulated FDR Across Different Methods - Setting 1 (n = 200, d = 40, k = 8)", x = "Signal Strength - Amplitude", y = "Simulated FDR") 
print(fdr_plot_summary_setting1_cutoff_replication_v2)
```
